name: Dribbble Shot Kit
description:
﻿Overview

We are proud to introduce Nija’s first product🔥

Dribbble Shot kit created as a pack for helping show your design on dribbble, easy to use and fast like ninja 🥷🏻

Feel free to use and make your projects looks better with our Dribbble Shot kit ✨


This Showcase Shot kit is totally free!

If this is useful for you, donate to us 🤑🤌

Easy customize and make it easier for you to set off your next shot on dribbble.

✅ 2 Style

✅ Easy customize
